subject: World Customs Organization  Of
body:
World Customs Organization  Of
United States Border Patrol
Address: 14700 Terminal Blvd #221, Clear-water, FL 33762, United States
Urgent message  
This is urgent Notice, If you are not ready to send the $350  for  your
Clearance paper of your ATM CARD that was  abandon here at Orlando
International Airport Florida usa why not inform us  or you  give us an update when  to send the money so that we obtain the needed documents  , Instead    of sending some one to come and claim  your $10Million in ATM CARD AND PIN  without any notice to us, We  received a message from a Lady  name Mrs  CARON  ELIZABETH  , according to her ,  she told  us that  you are seriously  sick and you Directed  her to come and claim your Fund in  ATM CARD  and PIN   She said that you are battling with Cancer and  have  only  two weeks to live on  earth and you ask  Her to pay the $350 charge for clearance and take the ATM CARD along with her  as  she is  your  next of kin , So i order my men to wait so that i verify first to avoid giving your
ATM CARD to wrong person, Now listen,  Are you battling with Cancer or not? Are you the one sent this  Lady or not?  we  need  your urgent  attentions Because  your  Responds  deter-main our actions against her,  if we  waited and you never  responds that means  we have no option than to accept that  Lady  is  right and  we let her pay the payment of $350  and have  the ATM CARD as your  next of  kin,
But 
if you are in Good health  and you never sent  Her, please get back to us with the payment information of the $1500   to enable  us deliver your ATM CARD
and Pn  to you,  Your ATM CARD will be deliver to you today and tomorrow if you can go and send the $350 which is the only  fee OK,
When  doing  that  Reconfirmed  to us your  Full  detail to avoid misstate such as
Youir Full name;;;;;;;
Your Address;;;;;
Your City and country;;;
Your WhatsApp  Number
If you are ready  to send  the $350  get back to me  or you  buy any  gift card such as  Apple  card or  Steam  wallet card,
 
Go and send the $350  or  we  give the  ATM CARD to her,
Contact us here;
Email   ;  
customsoff@mail2customs.com
   Or
Email  ;   
worldcustoms1@outlook.com
 
Agent  Mr Jason Owens
Customs Agent  of world customs organization of
 United States Border Patrol
Assistant agent;  Mr  Robert J ,Ballon

subject: Re: World Customs Organization  Of
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite a surprising message. I'm not aware of any ATM card that's been abandoned at Orlando Airport Florida USA. Also, I don't know any Mrs Caron Elizabeth and I certainly didn't direct anyone to claim anything on my behalf.

I'm sorry to hear about the misunderstanding but it seems like there's been some sort of mix-up. Could you please provide more details about this ATM card? How did it end up being abandoned at the airport? And how did my name get associated with it?

Also, could you clarify what exactly is the payment for? Is it for some kind of clearance fee or something else?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Helen

subject: Re: World Customs Organization  Of
body:

Thanks God  that  you are in good health,   What you  say is right  but   before  we  proceed    please  can you  provide  to us  your   full name  and information  as bellow  to enable us crosscheck with the  one we have  here to  make sure we are talking with the  rightful person,    try  to understand our demand,  we do this because  of what  is  happening,   so  reconfirmed to us your  detail as bellow,    
 
Youir Full name;;;;;;;
Your Address;;;;;
Your City and country;;;
Your WhatsApp  Number



If you are ready  to send  the $350  get back to me  or you  buy any  gift card such as  Apple  card or  Steam  wallet card,

 
Go and send the $350  or  we  give the  ATM CARD to her,

Contact us here;
Email   ;  customsoff@mail2customs.com   Or
Email  ;   worldcustoms1@outlook.com
                             

Agent  Mr Jason Owens
Customs Agent  of world customs organization of
 United States Border Patrol
Assistant agent;  Mr  Robert J ,Ballon

subject: Re: World Customs Organization  Of
body:
Hello there, 

I'm glad to hear from you. I hope you're doing well. It's quite interesting what you're saying about the World Customs of United States Border Patrol. Could you tell me more about it? What exactly is your role as a customs agent? And how does the process work?

As for the details you asked for, I'm sorry but I can't provide them at this moment. But I'd love to continue our conversation and learn more about your work.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Helen

subject: Re: World Customs Organization  Of
body:
World Customs Organization  Of
United States Border Patrol
Address: 14700 Terminal Blvd #221, Clear-water, FL 33762, United States

Am sorry  but  i  think  we are  not here for we  to learn  the  work of  custom  agent  and how it work,  but  we  are  here  to talk  about  how  you can receive  your   ATM CARD  who  some one try to claim  on your  behalf,   for security  reason if  you  refuse  to  reconfirmed  to us  your  information  to enable us verify  and be sure  that we are talking with the  right person  am sorry  i  have noting to say again,

If you are ready  to send  the $350  get back to me  or you  buy any  gift card such as  Apple  card or  Steam  wallet card,

subject: Re: World Customs Organization  Of
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm intrigued by this situation regarding the ATM card. Could you please provide more details about it? Who is trying to claim it on my behalf? 

Also, could you explain why gift cards like Apple or Steam wallet cards are needed in this process? I'm not very familiar with these things, so your explanation would be really helpful.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Helen

subject: Re: World Customs Organization  Of
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. I must say, it's quite surprising to hear about this ATM card. Could you please provide more details about it? How did it come into my name and why is Mrs Caron Elizabeth claiming it on my behalf?

Also, could you explain a bit more about the custom clearance process? I'm not very familiar with these things.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Helen
